import React from "react"; import classes from './Footer.module.css' import phone from './images/phone.png' import email from './images/email.png' import address from './images/address.png' import { useState } from "re" const Footer = () => { const [form, setForm] = useState({ name: '', product_name: '', review: '' }) const changeHandler = (event: React.FormEvent | React.ChangeEvent) => { setForm({ ...form, [event.currentTarget.name]: event.currentTarget.value }) } const showState = () => { console.log(form) } return (
